Title: Leaf from Amplified Poem in Honor of the Prophet Muhammad
Medium: ink and pigments on laid paper with chain lines grouped in twos
Keywords: Arabic; Islamic; Book; Calligraphy; Codex; Colophon; Illumination; Manuscript; Ornament; Iran; Turkey; Literature -- Poetry
Provenance: Mawlawi (Mevlevi) Library, Konya, Turkey (?), 767 AH/AD 1366 [mode of acquisition unknown] [bi-rasm al-Khizanah al-Karimah al-'Aliyah al-Mawlawiyah… (fol.1a)]; Henry Walters, Baltimore [date and mode of acquisition unknown]; Walters Art Museum, 1931, by bequest.
Creator: Nasir al-Din Muhammad al-Fayyumi
